conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you have any information about the delay of the train?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We've been waiting for quite some time now.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience. There seems to be a technical issue with the train.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Is there an estimated time for departure?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We have a connecting train to catch. This delay is really causing a problem.
